changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `funcionarios`; CREATE TABLE `funcionarios` ( `id_funcionario` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nome` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `data_nascimento` date NOT NULL, `foto` longblob, `salario` decimal(9,2) NOT NULL, `data_admissao` date NOT NULL, `data_demissao` date DEFAULT NULL, `id_endereco` bigint NOT NULL, `id_nivel` bigint NOT NULL, `id_cargo` bigint NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_funcionario`), UNIQUE KEY `nome_UNIQUE` (`nome`), KEY `id_enderco_fk_idx` (`id_endereco`), KEY `id_nivel_fk_idx` (`id_nivel`), KEY `id_cargo_fk_idx` (`id_cargo`), CONSTRAINT `id_cargo_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`id_cargo`) REFERENCES `cargos` (`id_cargo`), CONSTRAINT `id_enderco_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`id_endereco`) REFERENCES `enderecos` (`id_endereco`), CONSTRAINT `id_nivel_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`id_nivel`) REFERENCES `niveis` (`id_nivel`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=201 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
